column3: “I picked up an 8th of this from Phoenix Caregivers in Arizona. This is a VERY powerful haze.  I tried a few tokes and am very hazy. But also very focused and aware. This is a must have for any Haze fan. I tried Purple Haze before and this is right up there, more powerful tho. I will append this if things change, but so far. Its a 9/10.. Pick some up before its gone. I'll try to add pics later. Peace and Pot.”

“friend and i went ham on our mess of a room And cleaned this shit for two hours spotless. just wanted it to get done and felt like i could accomplish almost anything. didn't notice anything negative, i have depression as well and this bud gave a real nice indica high. fuckin CRON -503”

“This strain is a pleasure to use! Amazing taste! 
Great energy without paranoia.”
“I like the taste, It's fairly relaxing and helps a bit with my pain. It also provided me with a little more energy than usual. Overall I enjoyed this strain.”

“I love this strain!! haha had four bowls of it, very nice head high, haven't had a nice haze like this in a while. It's like Leafly states, nice for late afternoon, evening for a relaxed, uplifting mood. Excited I got over a half of this 😁”
“Pretty good but i like the regular Lavender better. The High isnt as great as the regular either. Still worth the toke!”
“Not a very clean high, caused confusion and agitated psychosis/paranoia. Tasted harsh and smelled bad. Could have been a bad batch but I'm not trying it again.”
“hazy, intense and very uplifting. Super kiefy and”

“Great Sativa with no paranoia or jitters.

Smells like purple haze and tastes like lavender.

Great morning medicine. Uplifting.

5/5”
“Oh geeze I loved this. A dense floral flavor with that smooth pungent taste. Good high.”

“As purples go , I really loved this . Purps or anything skunky is what I go for . This is a great strain that I've gotten time and time again and I really do enjoy smoking it when I have it it tastes amazing as well and for me a total creeper high.”
“a bit more relaxed than i was shooting for, but I tend to need more energizing strains to not pass out. taste was nice. I took it slow, and it still hit me hard.”
“Tastes and smells amazing, very relaxing high, blazed up with the Fam. Ultra DuBBed.”
“hazy, intense and very uplifting. Super kiefy and”
“I like the taste, It's fairly relaxing and helps a bit with my pain. It also provided me with a little more energy than usual. Overall I enjoyed this strain.”
“nice strain. a pleasing lavender taste. the buds are very dense. the spring floral bouquet scent is quiet prominent. overall an enjoyable experience.”
“Nice feel, great smell and down to earth high. it hits really smooth as well”
“has a great high. happy and alert. great for socializing! found you get a headache when coming down though. definetly a decent strain.”
“Hit a lick on this shit, put it into flames with the homies n got high as a motherfucker, very relaxing, blessed. Groovy taste. Strong smell.”
“Really badass head and body high. Was hitting a bowl of this bud out of my da Vinci ascent and was baked asf by the end of it”

“I get my Lavender Haze in pre-rolls from the Novel Tree in Bellevue, WA and it has become my favorite and go-to! I agree with the info on this page, it makes me feel happy and I can get a lot done. I feel like it helps me think abstractly so it's great for writing, art projects, daydreaming, or making laundry seem fun. I absolutely love the lavender-y smell and floral taste. It's relaxing and energizing at the same t...”
